# Airtable Integration

> **Source**: [https://www.testmuai.com/support/docs/airtable-integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/docs/airtable-integration)

**Product**: Integrations

**Last Crawled**: 2026-01-27T20:48:16.121942

---

On this page

* * *

Airtable is a cloud-collaboration platform to help you organize your team with intuitive & interactive spreadsheets that works like a database. It offers a variety of views such as Grid view, Kanban view, Calendar view, Form view. You can log a task with priority, notes, deadline and more. You can even tag attachments to a task with a simple drag-and-drop. Be it marketing, project management, product design & UX, or a simple distribution record for offline businesses, Airtable helps you to manage a track of anything.

Using TestMu AI integration with Airtable, you'll be able to log bugs over your project in Airtable from TestMu AI in just a single click. You can [capture a screenshot](https://www.lambdatest.com/full-page-screen-capture) of the bug, highlight the anomaly, annotate extra information, choose an assignee, provide a suitable title and description to help relay further actions. You can do all that directly from TestMu AI and then mark a bug to your Airtable project with just a single click.

## How To Integrate Airtable With Your TestMu AI Account?[â](https://www.testmuai.com/support/docs/airtable-integration#how-to-integrate-airtable-with-your--account "Direct link to how-to-integrate-airtable-with-your--account")

* * *

**Step 1:** Login to your TestMu AI account. You would need to have Admin or User level access to see and install integrations.

**Step 2:** Select 'Integration' from the left navigation menu bar. This will guide you to a screen where you will find a list of 3rd party applications, available to integrate with your TestMu AI account.

**Step 3:** Click on the block that says **'Airtable'**.

![Airtable Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/airtable-integration-1-04a2c1b533bc56654d39140b32a81b32.webp)

**Note:** If you have already installed a TestMu AI integration to any project management tool then you would come across a prompt asking you to disable your existing TestMu AI integration for integrating Airtable with your TestMu AI account.

![Airtable Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/airtable-integration-2-1f206d9ee9dc6556551d2a670f59711c.webp)

**Step 4:** You would now be routed to a screen where you'll need to enter your Airtable **App Key** & Airtable **API Key**.

![Airtable Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/airtable-integration-3-3044df53b81fe7943eecaef4388ab915.webp)

**Note:** You need to have **Bug Tracker** as a template in your Airtable account for TestMu AI integration with Airtable to work. After all, we're here to help you collect bugs and post them there. If you don't have a **Bug Tracker** template installed in your Airtable account, refer to [Airtable's official support documentation](https://airtable.com/templates/product-design-and-ux/expOzMycWirMsUOTL/bug-and-issue-tracker) for instantly setting up the template.

![Airtable Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/airtable-integration-4-b3fd5a6f21aec8c18fd4942deccc287c.webp)

**Step 5:** If this is your first project in Airtable, you'll need to generate an API Key that will help TestMu AI to authenticate your user information from Airtable for integration purpose. Go to your **Account Overview** & click on the button to **Generate API Key**.

![Airtable Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/airtable-integration-5-5657582314630dbce553fb9966a22988.webp)

> **Note** : Consider API Key as your passwords, the API Key will help anyone grant a third-party application on the behalf of your Airtable account so be sure to keep it safe and sound. In case you feel your API Key is revealed to someone then you must re-generate your Airtable API Key.
> 
> ![Airtable Integration](data:image/webp;base64,)

**Step 6:** Now, to find your App ID, you need to visit <https://airtable.com/api>. Then select your base project i.e. Bug Tracker for integrating TestMu AI with Airtable.

**Step 7:** After you open the Bug tracker, you'll find the App ID for your base project. Copy this App ID.

![Airtable Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/airtable-integration-7-b6c5b3624e141e2f6bd18661fea2350c.webp)

**Step 8:** Next, you need to paste you API Key & App ID over TestMu AI integration screen for Airtable. Click the install button.

![Airtable Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/airtable-integration-8-d02d21fbc44cf5233f0c12f75d7cc3c5.webp)

Kudos! You've successfully integrated TestMu AI with Airtable. You will find Airtable Integration highlighted under the section "**My Integration** ".

![Airtable Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/airtable-integration-9-a684526ad6922485e4af8ee3477eed82.webp)

## How To Log Bug Using TestMu AI Integration To Airtable?[â](https://www.testmuai.com/support/docs/airtable-integration#how-to-log-bug-using--integration-to-airtable "Direct link to how-to-log-bug-using--integration-to-airtable")

* * *

**Step 1:** Go for any of the test from the left navigation menu. For demo, we will be taking **"Real Time Test"** option.

**Step 2:** Present a URL of the web-app you need to test in the dialog box. After that, select any configuration for browser and operating system of your choice & hit **'Start'**.

![Airtable Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/airtable-integration-10-61e29caf533c7fbccbbbc60e1bc34c97.webp)

**Step 3:** After the VM is launched and operable. You can perform testing on your web-app for finding bugs. If a bug gets revealed, then you need to click on the **Bug icon** from the left panel to capture a screenshot of the bug.

![Airtable Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/airtable-integration-11-12151bc55de09c028e5460444312ff0a.webp)

**Step 4:** After a screenshot is captured, you can annotate any issue or a task with an built-in image editor. Once you are done highlighting the bug, click on the button that says "**Mark as Bug** ".

![Airtable Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/airtable-integration-12-c6080c36a51c14ebb318e98cf8030626.webp)

**Step 5:** After clicking on "Mark as Bug" button a form specific to **Airtable **would open up. Fill the fields as per your requirement, and create the issue.

![Airtable Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/airtable-integration-13-3442d2128df9c511183492e27965c63b.webp)

> You can simply field the Name field and create a bug or you can go in-depth around the bug by providing the below details as well:
> 
>   * Name
> 

  * Priority
  * Status
  * Associated features
  * Created by
  * Associated to
  * Bug source
  * Description

**Note:** After you click on **"Create Bug"** , you will be able to observe it being successfully marked through a single click effort. You will get prompt messages on top of your Virtual Machine indicating the progress of bug logging. After few seconds you will be notified with a **prompt message** "Bug successfully marked" indicating that the screenshot has been pushed to your **Airtable project**.

![Airtable Integration](data:image/webp;base64,)

**Step 6:** Now, if you visit your Bug tracker in Airtable, you'll find the bug that you logged from TestMu AI in it with all the provided details along with the screenshot of the bug. The bug with details can also be found under the features tab with the associated feature.

![Airtable Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/airtable-integration-14-d147e8db9249b68b214ca02700dc6a4b.webp)

**Step 7:** Once you click over the Name, you will find a card which has all the details provided from TestMu AI.

![Airtable Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/airtable-integration-17-cad65858f0814a83e90a47f6bea00717.webp)

## How To Remove TestMu AI Integration With Airtable?[â](https://www.testmuai.com/support/docs/airtable-integration#how-to-remove--integration-with-airtable "Direct link to how-to-remove--integration-with-airtable")

* * *

> You can work with one integration at a time. So if you would want to integrate to a similar 3rd party application, then you would have to **remove** your current integration. Here is how you can do that.

**Step 1:** Login to your TestMu AI account.

**Step 2:** Select **'Integrations'** from the left-navigation menu. This will guide you to a screen where you will find 3rd party applications, available to integrate with your TestMu AI account.

**Step 3:** Under "My Integrations", click on **'Remove'** button. You can find also find the remove button under the 'Airtable' block.

![Airtable Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/airtable-integration-18-49496fc3ec09a1188ce46eedd6853143.webp)

That was all you need to know for TestMu AI \+ Airtable Integration. Increase your productivity with our integrations. If you still have any questions for us, please feel free to let us know. Our experts are always available on **chat** to help you out with any roadblock regarding our product. Happy testing! ð
